name: My Mistress Lu Bu
description:
You were born into the rough hands of the notorious group of bandits, the Yellow Turbans. After their downfall, you lead a small crew of bandits until you're defeated by the warlord Lu Bu. She spares you in exchange for your fealty, and thus begins your service to your mistress Lu Bu.​ In her service, you will work as an officer, taking on numerous battles and enemies including famous generals from the Three Kingdoms Era such as Cao Cao, Liu Bei, Yuan Shao, and more. But you won't always be fighting them alone, you also have the mighty Lu Bu on your side, along with Zhang Liao, Gao Shun, and Chen Gong, who also happen to be beautiful women.

The game features turn-based tactical military battles that are simple and fast-paced with completely optional grinding to level up and get special items. You can earn Merit through winning battles and use them to purchase items to customize your combat style, ranging from brute force to tactics.

You can also romance and forge bonds with your mistress and fellow officers, leading to various adult scenes. Forging a bond with them may also boost their stats in combat.
